In the notoriously cut-throat music industry, Simon Cowell says he's learned it's crucial not to show weakness to competitors. People sometimes react to my confidence in the way that two dogs meet in the park for the first time- regardless of who is the biggest, if one dog senses fear it will kill the other dog, said the 51-year-old. the past. Howard Stern to David Letterman : sorry about your sex scandal( video) Instead of deflecting Howard Stern 's apology, David Letterman responded with candor and a bit of reciprocal praise. ''You have been very, very nice to me on the radio and viciously ugly to me on the radio and I except both with equanimity because I know a little bit about how you operate and I'm still fond of your talent and your ability and what you've represented to the United States of America-and of course, the world.''
